alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 12:20PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County south of Bellemont through 1245 PM MST... At 1219 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Kachina Village, or 12 miles southwest of Flagstaff, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
